Text.Page:
Here's some holy water. Sprinkle it on the dead bodies in the Brimstone Highlands to return their souls to the Dream.

That means no ghosts, no dead rising from the grave... none of that.

One other thing: gather personal effects from the bodies if you can. We always try to give something back to the families. Helps the grieving process, I'm told.
(The holy water fizzes and bubbles as you pour it over the corpse. The putrid odor of death fades.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Return to the Dream, friend."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
(You take the weapon from the body's side and the tags from around its neck.)
(The holy water fizzes and bubbles as you pour it over the corpse. The putrid odor of death fades.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Return to the Dream, friend."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
(You take the weapon from the body's side and the tags from around its neck.)
(The holy water fizzes and bubbles as you pour it over the corpse. The putrid odor of death fades.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Return to the Dream, friend."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
(You take the weapon from the body's side and the tags from around its neck.)

All finished? And some personal effect for the families?

I'll send those off to Castanica straightaway. Thank you, .

For the federation!
